title: TDC2 Winners Posted!
content:
The results of TDC2 2002 : Type Directors Club Type Design Competition 2002 have been posted, with scans of the winning entries!   
   
 [http://www.tdc.org/news/2002Results/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712185749/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2002Results/index.html)
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
I think (or maybe it's more like a hope, considering my own recent efforts) that I see a new style trend. Look at Whitman, Azuza and Siemens(Serif), and add on FF Zine and Foundry's Form.   
   
hhp
